title: BONUS EPISODE: Treach talks Naughty By Nature, Tupac, + Hip-Hop Greats
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Peter Rosenberg sits down with Treach for a GREAT conversation and stories in hip hop history. They discussed the beginning of Naughty By Nature, relationship with Queen Latifah, 2Pac and his complicated relationship, going on tour with Run DMC, meeting Michael Jackson and Janet Jackson, and much more! Treach stars in 'Lord of the Streets' available on Tubi. He is also featured on his daughter Egypt Criss' single "Gladiator" available now. 

LISTEN TO HOT 97's NEWEST PODCAST "TAP IN WITH TT" ON:

Apple Podcasts -https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/tap-in-with-tt/id1618314923
